price: 3. Boye soki tango tokokufaka tokokomaka putulu? Wana ekozalaka bozongi ya mosika.
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
